name: Every President Ever
description:
You are the President!

Your term ends in 7 days and a LOT of documents needs signing.

Through your connections, documents that increase your personal finances have been sneaked in.

Can you fail at being a good president to increase your bank account?

Controls:

Mouse + Left Click (Point and Click Game)

Escape - Pause Game

Rules:

Left Click the Phone on the Desk to call for documents to sign.

You are given 3 types of documents

Good Documents - Beneficial to the country (Costs you money)

Bad Documents - Beneficial to you (Earns you money)

Terrible Documents - Beneficial to no one (Costs you money and a life)

The Vice President will be watching you from time to time and if he catches you signing bad and terrible documents, then you lose a life!

Being seen signing good documents and rejecting bad documents will lessen his chance of guarding you! While doing the opposite increases that chance!

Developer notes:

This is a submission to Wowie Game Jam and I kind of overestimated my capabilities to finish the game in a span of 3 days hahaha! Unfortunately, I ran out of time to fully polish the game and add additional functionality to the game that I initially intended to have. Alas, you cannot have it all so hopefully this can still be a fun game!

Constructive Criticism is welcome, this is my first completed game as a developer and additional notes and lessons will certainly be helpful! 

Enjoy and have a great day!
